titleStmt.title: To the high court of Parliament of the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland. The remonstrance and humble petition of Susanna Bastwick (the distressed widow of John Bastwick doctor in physick) and her children.
titleStmt.author: Bastwick, Susanna.

notesStmt.note: Praying for relief and recompense for the sufferings of her husband in the service of the Parliament.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English books).
